movies.title: Hajde da se volimo
movies.plot: Story of Lepa Brena, and her journey and adventures during one of her tours through Yugoslavia.
movies.simplePlot: Story of Lepa Brena, and her journey and adventures during one of her tours through Yugoslavia.

biography.bio: Lepa Brena is Serbian singer of pop and folk music, and a former musical actress. With more than 40 million records sold, she was the most successful and the most popular singer of former Yugoslavia. In 1991, Brena married Serbian tennis player Slobodan Zivojinovic, with whom she has two children. Her prefix (Lepa), means ''beautiful''.
biography.name: Lepa Brena

biography.bio: Dragomir Bojanic-Gidra was born on June 13, 1933 in Kragujevac, Serbia, Yugoslavia. He was an actor and producer, known for Zikina dinastija (1985), Druga Zikina dinastija (1986) and Kakav deda takav unuk (1983). He was married to Ljiljana Kontic. He died on November 11, 1993 in Belgrade, Serbia, Federal Republic of Yugoslavia.
biography.name: Dragomir Bojanic-Gidra

biography.bio: Milutin 'Mima' Karadzic was born on April 9, 1955 in Bijelo Polje, Montenegro, Yugoslavia. He is an actor and producer, known for Komsije (2015), Montevideo: Taste of a Dream (2010) and The Beauty of Vice (1986).
biography.name: Milutin 'Mima' Karadzic

biography.bio: Svetislav 'Bule' Goncic was born on May 5, 1960 in Kladovo, Serbia, Yugoslavia. He is an actor, known for Oktoberfest (1987), Srecni ljudi (1993) and Living Like the Rest of Us (1982). He is married to Gordana Goncic. They have two children.
biography.name: Svetislav 'Bule' Goncic

biography.bio: Velimir 'Bata' Zivojinovic was born on June 5, 1933 in Koracica near Mladenovac, Serbia, Yugoslavia. He was an actor, known for Srecni ljudi (1993), Ice (2012) and Joli village, jolie flamme (1996). He was married to Julijana 'Lula' Zivojinovic. He died on May 22, 2016 in Belgrade, Serbia.
biography.name: Velimir 'Bata' Zivojinovic

biography.bio: Miodrag Andric was born on January 28, 1943 in Kragujevac, Serbia, Yugoslavia. He was an actor and writer, known for WR: Mysteries of the Organism (1971), Love Affair, or the Case of the Missing Switchboard Operator (1967) and Moljac (1984). He died on January 22, 1989 in Glina, Croatia, Yugoslavia.
biography.name: Miodrag Andric

biography.bio: Nikola-Kole Angelovski was born on March 14, 1943 in Skoplje, Macedonia, Yugoslavia. He is an actor and director, known for La vengeance du faucon (1981), The Meeting Point (1989) and Doci i ostati (1965).
biography.name: Nikola-Kole Angelovski

biography.bio: Milan Strljic was born on March 22, 1952 in Tordinci kraj Vinkovaca, Croatia, Yugoslavia. He is an actor, known for Balkan Spy (1984), Fine Dead Girls (2002) and Cashier Wants to Go to the Seaside (2000).
biography.name: Milan Strljic

biography.bio: Boro Stjepanovic was born on May 8, 1946 in Vares, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Yugoslavia as Borislav Stjepanovic. He is an actor and director, known for No Man's Land (2001), Tata i zetovi (2006) and Qui chante là-bas? (1980).
biography.name: Boro Stjepanovic

biography.bio: Sasa Popovic was born on April 24, 1954 in Novi Sad, Serbia, Yugoslavia. He is an actor and producer, known for Grand Show (2003), Hajde da se volimo (1987) and Hajde da se volimo 2 (1989).
biography.name: Sasa Popovic

biography.bio: Dusan Trifuncevic was born on May 25, 1950 in Belgrade, Serbia, Yugoslavia. He was an actor, known for Hajde da se volimo (1987) and Hajde da se volimo 2 (1989). He died on February 24, 2014 in Novi Sad, Serbia.
biography.name: Dusan Trifuncevic

biography.bio: Branislav Mijatovic is an actor, known for Hajde da se volimo (1987) and Hajde da se volimo 2 (1989).
biography.name: Branislav Mijatovic

biography.bio: Ljubisa Markovic is an actor, known for Hajde da se volimo (1987) and Hajde da se volimo 2 (1989).
biography.name: Ljubisa Markovic

biography.bio: Zivojin Matic is an actor, known for Hajde da se volimo (1987) and Hajde da se volimo 2 (1989).
biography.name: Zivojin Matic

biography.bio: Zoran Radanov is an actor, known for Hajde da se volimo (1987) and Hajde da se volimo 2 (1989).
biography.name: Zoran Radanov
